snippet: About 200 employees of The Times-Picayune in New Orleans were told their last day would be Sept. 30, while about 400 staff members of three newspapers in Alabama are also being let go.
abstract: About 200 employees of The Times-Picayune in New Orleans were told their last day would be Sept. 30, while about 400 staff members of three newspapers in Alabama are also being let go.

headline.main: Big Staff Reductions Imposed at Papers in New Orleans and Alabama
